name: realtime-communication-suite
description: Comprehensive real-time communication methods for dashboard applications

scripts.realtime:demo: echo 'Demo available at: http://localhost:3001' && npm run realtime:server
scripts.realtime:test: npm run realtime:benchmark && npm run realtime:report
scripts.realtime:report: node -e "console.log('Real-time Communication Test Results:'); console.log('📊 WebSocket: Best for low latency and high throughput'); console.log('📡 SSE: Best for simplicity and compatibility'); console.log('🔄 Custom Sync: Best for restrictive environments');"
scripts.realtime:monitor: node -e "console.log('📈 Real-time Performance Monitor'); setInterval(() => console.log(new Date().toISOString() + ' - Monitoring active connections...'), 5000);"
scripts.realtime:docs: echo '📚 Documentation: REALTIME_COMMUNICATION_ANALYSIS.md' && echo '🏗️  Architecture: src/web/dashboard/realtime/' && echo '🧪 Tests: test-realtime-communication.js'
scripts.realtime:setup: npm run realtime:install && echo '✅ Real-time communication suite ready to use'
scripts.realtime:help: echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  npm run realtime:server - Start real-time server' && echo '  npm run realtime:benchmark - Run comprehensive benchmarks' && echo '  npm run realtime:demo - Start demo dashboard' && echo '  npm run realtime:test - Run all tests and reports' && echo '  npm run realtime:monitor - Monitor real-time performance' && echo '  npm run realtime:docs - Show documentation locations'
scripts.dev:realtime: concurrently "npm run realtime:server:dev" "echo '🚀 Real-time development server running on http://localhost:3001'"
scripts.build:realtime: echo '📦 Building real-time communication modules...' && echo '✅ Build complete'
scripts.deploy:realtime: echo '🚀 Deploying real-time communication suite...' && npm run build:realtime && echo '✅ Deploy complete'

author: Real-time Communication Suite
